title: Texas border city struggles with large arrival of migrants
description: Migrants have abruptly begun crossing by the thousands from Mexico.

title: Flood concerns rise as Mississippi River crests in Iowa city
description: The National Weather Service says the Mississippi River is cresting in Iowa as areas along the river continue to brace for flooding

title: General Mills issues flour recall after salmonella discovery
description: General Mills has issued a nationwide recall of its bleached and unbleached flour after discovering salmonella while sampling a 5-pound bag

title: WATCH:  Black bear cub enjoys playtime at wildlife center
description: A rescued black bear cub enjoyed some playtime with caretakers at a wildlife center in Virginia.

title: Minnesota woman who left newborn to die sentenced to prison
description: She left her newborn son to die on the banks of the Mississippi two decades ago.

title: Be tough in seizing Iran oil, bipartisan senators urge Biden
description: A dozen senators are making a bipartisan appeal to President Joe Biden.

title: 3 indicted in Alabama mail thefts involving stolen keys
description: A federal investigation found that a letter carrier illegally sold access keys.

title: US launches first mass evacuation effort from Sudan
description: The State Department confirmed a U.S.-led evacuation from Sudan on Saturday.

title: Wrongfully convicted Kansas man to get $7.5 million payment
description: A Kansas county will pay $7.5 million to a man who spent 16 years in prison for a rape and murder he didn't commit

title: 210 migrant bodies wash up on Tunisia coast in under 2 weeks
description: Tunisia’s coast guard says that under two weeks it has recovered around 210 bodies of migrants that have washed up on the North African country’s central coastline amid an ongoing increase in migration from Tunisia

title: Police officer, wife found dead in their North Carolina home
description: Authorities say a police officer and his wife were found shot to death in their North Carolina home after the officer failed to show up for work

title: 5 dead in Texas shooting, suspect armed with AR-15 is on the loose
description: Five people are dead after being shot in a home by a suspect armed with AR-15 style rifle, police say.

title: US ex-security adviser calls for closer ties with Taiwan
description: A former U.S. national security adviser has called for deeper interaction between his country and Taiwan during a visit to the self-ruled island, which has seen increasing military threats from China

title: WATCH:  Watch this goldendoodle become best friends with his furry new brother
description: Beau and Cooper are besties for life!

title: Presidential battleground states weigh more election funding
description: Officials in several battleground states have proposed boosting funding to add staff, enhance security and expand training within election offices ahead of the 2024 race

title: St. Louis officer shot during mental health welfare check
description: A St. Louis police officer has been shot and wounded during a mental health-related welfare check at an apartment complex

title: Gender-affirming trans care for minors blocked in Montana
description: Montana became the latest state to ban gender-affirming care for transgender youth after Gov. Greg Gianforte signed a bill that was passed in the legislature last week.
